en_text: All the while waiting for you to deliver some news at the table. teeburu no ue no furuenai shirase machitsuzukete
jp_text: テーブルの上の　震えない知らせ　待ち続けて
google_translated: Successful notes to shake above the table

en_text: Empty nights, mornings that will never arrive,
jp_text: 空白の夜も　来るはずのない朝も
google_translated: Even if a blank night can not come

en_text: I could see them from a mile away.
jp_text: 全部わかってたんだ

en_text: While holding the promise we couldn't keep,
jp_text: 果たせなかった　約束を抱いて
google_translated: Hugging a promise that could not be fulfilled

en_text: And so, about Central...
jp_text: で　セントラルだがな

en_text: Central, huh?
jp_text: セントラルか　悪くないな

en_text: If you manage to get to the top at that age, you'll gain a lot of enemies.
jp_text: その若さで上層部に食い込むとなると敵も増えるぞ
google_translated: If you get into the upper part in the youngness, the enemy will increase

en_text: I'm prepared for it.
jp_text: もとより覚悟のうえだ

en_text: Words of wisdom from your senior in Central.
jp_text: セントラルの先輩としての忠告だ
google_translated: It is an advice as a senior of Central

en_text: Have a lot of people who understand and are willing to support you.
jp_text: お前さんを理解して支えてくれる人間を
google_translated: A person who understands and supports you

en_text: Why'd he hang up on me like that?
jp_text: なんでぇ　いきなり切りやがって

en_text: Lt. Colonel Hughes, please keep personal calls to a minimum!
jp_text: ヒューズ中佐　私用電話は程々にしてくださいね
google_translated: Please make sure that the fuse is private call

en_text: Oh, sorry.
jp_text: あっ　ごめん

en_text: Edward Elric hesitates to speak his words...
jp_text: エドワード·エルリックは言葉を躊躇い

en_text: ...and Alphonse Elric becomes perplexed by Barry's words.
jp_text: アルフォンス·エルリックは言葉によって惑わされる
google_translated: Alphonse Erlick is misled by words

en_text: The one certainty is that a girl's memories hold the truth.
jp_text: そしてただ一つ　確かなもの

en_text: Episode 9, Created Feelings.
jp_text: 第九話　創られた想い

en_text: Their hearts waver because they put their trust in each other.
jp_text: 心が揺れる　それは信じていたから
google_translated: Because I believed that I could shake
